title: Poovarasam Peepee (2013)
overview: Three boys, who are spending their summer vacation together, witness a crime and decide to bring the guilty to book.
storyline: The only profile of three kids hold is that they have completed their class 6 and confident on being promoted to class 7. Little did they know that their summer holidays will bring them to witness a crime and go further in investigating it and even further by bringing justice to the victim Tin phones, little Remote Controlled Chopper with spy cam, fun science experiments like glowing eggs, phosphorous fire are the tools and tactics to bring down the accused ,initially. Later it picks up to a scale where they even operate a Ham Radio to use it a medium to express about the crime to their small town and thus influencing them being undercover Summer Adventure like never before.
